TopicTitle: Looking for Large bays with doors (cant find them on cursed)

Articles.Content:
Cant find mods since they moved too cursed, Looking for Cargo Bays with doors, Large ones for carrying Robotics ect ect.

Anyhow know the names , of these mods or have links.

Thanks
Perhaps you're looking for B9 Aerospace? It's the most common part pack that I am aware of that has quite a few cargo bays.
B9 has the best cargo bays out there currently.
i'm using the LSI SpaceJunk Cargo Bays
